name: Pursuing Susie
description:
This short novel about a young girl, Morgan, who is studying at the university. She lives with a roommate, outside the campus. They have a very active and full of pleasures life.
Once to them in the house populated girl Susie. Morgan and Angelina in any way try to involve a new girlfriend in their hot games.

Read about their attempts and ingenious plan. Will they be able to do this?Features
  • Visual Novel game with Sexy Content.
  • A cute and fun well written story-line.
  • 1080p window & Full Screen Options.
  • Steam achievements
